title: Bella Thorne declares she's finally found her confidence after making porn debut
text:

Bella Thorne has declared she's finally "found her confidence" after posting a series of make-up free pics on Instagram on Tuesday.

The 21-year-old former Disney Channel star showed off her natural beauty as she posted the glowing snaps, proudly revealing her freckles and make-up free complexion.

The Disney wild child recently made her debut in the porn industry as she directed a sexually explicit movie for pornographic website Pornhub.

(Image: Instagram)

She posted a caption alongside her snaps, suggesting her new line of work is the reason behind her new-found confidence.

She wrote: "This is me at 22, no filters no edits, the usual. I found myself confidence this year, 22 has in store for me beauty, laughter, lots of tears, and work work work and more work."

The Her and Him director also celebrated her 22nd birthday on Tuesday.

Bella used the celebrations to go Instagram official with a new gal pal and posted a nearly-nude snap.

(Image: Instagram)

She wrote: "She’s very cute. First girl I have dated that’s camera shy."

Despite her new romantic interest, Bella is still dating her Italian beau Benjamin Mascolo , who seemed thrilled as he commented on Bella's new semi-naked photos.

After Bella directed a Pornhub movie in August, the actress spoke openly about her sexuality on TV show Good Morning America.

(Image: Instagram)

She said: “I’m actually pansexual and I didn’t know that. Somebody explained to me really thoroughly what that is.

“You like beings. You like what you like."

The 21-year-old film and television actress also revealed she wanted to make a horror film before pornographic website PornHub invited her to direct a sexually explicit movie instead.

She released her pornographic film as part of PornHub’s Visionaries Director’s Series – an initiative to showcase debut projects from directors and intended to diversify the content found within porn.

(Image: REUTERS)

(Image: Bella Thorne/Instagram)

Bella’s film won PornHub’s Vision Award for it’s effort – something the actress was thrilled to receive.

“I’m honoured to receive this award," she told Entertainment Weekly.

"I'm excited for visions of beauty like this to be shed in a new light. Breaking the taboo of what's classified as beautiful has always been a vision of mine and it brings me such joy to see this being recognised for what it truly is… beautiful visionary art,” she added.

Bella's Disney background seems a whole word away.

The star used to play CeCe Jones alongside Zendaya in the series Shake It Up between 2010 and 2013 before landing roles in dramas including Big Love (a drama about polygamy starring Chloe Sevigny) and horror TV show Scream (based on the Wes Craven film series).
description: The American actress recently directd a porn video - which won her an award from pornographic resource PornHub
